Document:
# Roleplay Rule 5 - Play a Believable Character Remember to treat the game like a round of DND, try to make a believable character and stick with it.
## Examples
### [bold] Permitted [/bold]
- Making a unique personality and sticking to it. - Making a boring personality and sticking to it.
### [bold] Not Permitted [/bold]
- Acting completely goddamn insame for no reason. - Having a peronality that causes nothing but issues for other people as a non-antagonist. - Don't make your entire personality "completely insufferable"
